items.content_html: A lightweight backend API for the HexaCode programming language, written in Python using Flask. HexaCode is a custom French-based programming language designed for educational and creative use. This backend powers the HexaCode web playground, allowing users to write and execute HexaCode scripts in real-time without downloads.
items.title: Bluebull7/HexaCode: A lightweight backend API for the HexaCode programming language, written in Python using Flask. HexaCode is a custom French-based programming language designed for educational and creative use. This backend powers the HexaCode web playground, allowing users to write and execute HexaCode scripts in real-time without downloads.

items.content_html: A collection of optimized Dockerfiles for various platforms, including Next.js, Node.js, Spring Boot, and more. This repo focuses on reducing image sizes while maintaining functionality, making containerized deployments efficient and lightweight
